rules.prepare:
export PKG_CONFIG="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config"
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -vi
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-silent-rules \ --with-trust-paths=/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt \ --with-hash-impl=internal \ --disable-nls \ --disable-doc
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" find . -name "*.la" -exec rm '{}' ';'
ln -sf "libp11-kit.so" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/p11-kit-proxy.so"
